title: Emerald Aura Jhumkas: A Touch of Tradition with Modern Elegance
materials: adorned with Cubic Zirconia and a vibrant Emerald Green Zircon. Features a lustrous
cultured Pearl drop. The intricate design is finished with a Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: These captivating Jhumkas showcase a fusion of traditional silhouette with modern detailing. The floral stud features a prominent Emerald Green Zircon, surrounded by sparkling Cubic Zirconia. The Jhumka bell is intricately designed with openwork filigree, adding a touch of lightness and sophistication. A delicate Pearl drop completes the design, adding a classic touch.
colors: accented by the vibrant Emerald Green Zircon and the soft white of the Pearl.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali
and family gatherings. Their elegant design makes them suitable for both traditional attire (like sarees and lehengas) and contemporary outfits.
description: These Jhumkas effortlessly blend traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern sensibilities. The vibrant Emerald Green Zircon adds a pop of color and sophistication, while the Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting shine. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear for extended periods. A perfect statement piece to elevate any ensemble.
